name: Jinrai no senshi Card Warrior Card

pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Card Warrior Kamen Riders (2009, manga/toyline)$(br)$(li)Used to access Kuuga's $(l:kuuga/riders/kuuga#jinrai_no_senshi)Rising Mighty (Jinrai no Senshi)$(/l) form$(li)Used to access Blade's $(l:blade/riders/blade#jinrai_no_senshi)Jinrai no Senshi$(/l) form$(li)Used to access Dark Kabuto's $(l:kabuto/riders/dark_kabuto#jinrai_no_senshi)Jinrai no Senshi$(/l) form
